    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114567</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Amplitude modulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang Modulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modulation d'amplitude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modulação de amplitude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modulazione di ampiezza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμόρφωση εύρους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modulación de amplitud</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This sinusoidal graph shows the relationship of time and carrier voltage of the resulting 20-carrier-cycle amplitude modulated signal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude modulated signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude modulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carrier cycles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carrier voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time axis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage axis</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses sinusförmige Diagramm zeigt das 
Verhältnis der Zeit und der Fördermaschinespannung des 
resultierenden Umfang modulierten Signals 20-carrier-cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique sinusoïdal montre le rapport de la 
période et de la tension de porteur du signal 20-carrier-cycle 
modulé par amplitude résultant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico sinusoidal mostra o relacionamento 
da época e da tensão do portador do sinal 20-carrier-cycle modulado 
amplitude resultante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico sinusoidale mostra il rapporto di 
periodo e di tensione dell'elemento portante del segnale modulato 
ampiezza risultante 20-carrier-cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ημιτονοειδής γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει τη 
σχέση του χρόνου και τάση μεταφορέων του προκύπτοντος 
διαμορφωμένου εύρος σήματος 20-μεταφορέας-κύκλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico sinusoidal muestra el lazo de la 
época y del voltaje del portador de la señal modulada amplitud que 
resulta 20-carrier-cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang moduliertes Signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang Modulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fördermaschineschleifen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spannung Mittellinie</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">signal modulé par amplitude</string>
